casebody.data:
Neill GRADING
v.
LINGAFELT. No. 112PA05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 10, 2005. Mack Sperling, Greensboro, Carles E. Coble, Raleigh, for Lingafelt, et al. Stephen M. Thomas, Michael J. Barnett, Hickory, for Neill Grading & Construction.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 6th day of October 2005 by Defendant for Leave to File Reply Brief:

"Motion Denied. By order of the Court in conference this the 10th day of October 2005."
